item.title: Starting a new job at Virtonomy
item.description: On February 1st 2022, I officially start a new adventure as Senior Simulation Engineer at Virtonomy :tada: My mission there will be to develop methods and applications for the simulation of cardiovascular related medical scenarios :heart:, with the aim to shorten time to market for medical devices developers. Once this is well-established, direction orthopedics :rocket:
